summary: As a mysterious planet hurls itself toward Earth, an enigmatic extraterrestrial scout arrives on a remote Scottish island with unknown intentions.
cast: Robert Clarke|Margaret Field|Raymond Bond|William Schallert|Roy Engel|David Ormont|Gilbert Fallman|Tom Daly|June Jeffery|Charles Davis|Franklyn Farnum|Pat Goldin|Harold Gould|Lars Hensen|Ian Murray
title: El ser del planeta X
